exceptions.exn: In environment T : cpo s1, s2 : Pred T T' : s1 <=p s2 s2' : T s1' : s2' \\In chain_closure s1 H : Pred T H0 : s2 <=p H H1 : chain_closed H Unable to unify "Pred T" with "s2' \\In H".
In environment T : cpo s1, s2 : Pred T T' : s1 <=p s2 s2' : T s1' : s2' \\In chain_closure s1 H : Pred T H0 : s2 <=p H H1 : chain_closed H Unable to unify "chain_closed H" with "s2' \\In H".

original: intros T s2 s1 H. unfold chain_closure. unfold chain_closure in H. intros x H1 H2. apply H. apply H1. apply H2.
